body.text: Zeldin OB, Brunger AT. 2013. Gently does it for submicron crystals. eLife 2:e01662. doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.7554/eLife.01662. Published 19 November 2013

The original version of this article contained three errors: the last sentence of the fourth paragraph referred to 100 Å where it should have referred to 100 nm; the first sentence of the fifth paragraph referred to 500 Å where it should have referred to 500 nm; and the last sentence of the fifth paragraph referred to a dose of ‘less than nine electrons per Å<sup>2</sup>’ where it should have referred to a dose of ‘less than nine electrons per Å<sup>2</sup> spread over about 90 images’.
The article has been corrected accordingly.
